thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing value for city centre
thread.title_full: Amazing value for city centre - Review of Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: vic198031
title: Amazing value for city centre
text: Can't fault this hotel. Staff were all really friendly and helpful, clean room, comfortable bed, central location and good breakfast. Tower of London is a short walk away and The Shard is just over the river. I don't think you will get much better value for money in central London.
